subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
Maritime Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: After the death of a British sailor in a training accident, Luna Rossa Challenge said it would consider not participating in the America’s Cup if wind limits for the race were not lowered.
snippet: After the death of a British sailor in a training accident, Luna Rossa Challenge said it would consider not participating in the America’s Cup if wind limits for the race were not lowered.
